English: With our monarch on the English throne, talks of formally uniting our two nations have increased dramatically. If united, we will have a stronger economic, military, and naval power-Significant factors needed during the modern age. This is an opportunity for prosperity that should not be missed!
With the eastern coast of the Adriatic firmly under our grasp, it is now time to look over to the west-The rich territories of Veneto and beyond are aching for our rule! Glory to us!

The Germans have no claim nor reason to rule over our Cisalpine brothers in Lombardia. Our Italian compatriots are in desparate need for our help-we shall march to Milan and free them once and for all! Glory to Venice!
As our power grows, we should strive to unite more of the Ligurian coast under our rule. Consolidating the regions of Massa and Lucca would be the first step of that plan. Glory to Genoa!
As Liguria is under our rule, now it is time to expand down the Tyrrhenian coast. The territories of Lazio and Campania will be ours!

Since the Coptic revolution the Barbarians have fled south. We werent able to beat them at the time , but now we have the strength to do so. We shall annex Nubia and finally prove to the world that we are the true heirs to the Egyptian civilization!
While our Corsaire navy does the job well, no legitimate state can use only pirates for its force projection. It is time we formally incorporate our scattered units into a true standing army.

As we modernize, people are starting to wonder if our ancestor's dreams of restoring Rome can be truly realized. The first step would to be marching north and restoring the provinces of Roman Africa-even if that means fighting the Berber nomad lords of the Sahara!
Finally, Morocco is united. The lands are no more split, and now we can form an united front against the Iberians. Glory to the Makhzen!
Finally, Algeria is united. The lands are no more split, and now we can form an united front against the Iberians. Glory to Jalalatuh!

Now that Morocco is united, we can move onto more long term projects. Morocco has been historically based on the city of Marrakesh, and we seek to continue that tradition. With a new palace, new fortifications, and a new military mission to be built, Marrakesh shall serve us well for our crown.

The tribes south of the city of Guelmim have always been a thorn on our side. Paying tribute to us half the time and raiding us on the other half, they are both loyal subjects and barbarian menaces. No more. We shall fortify important oasis cities and secure the water near the major wadis. They will bow to us.
Tunis can never be safe from the Berber tribes down south if our borders are so close to the city. We must push south and secure a larger base for our city.
Bone can never be safe from the Berber tribes down south if our borders are so close to our treaty port. We must push south and secure a larger base for our port.
With our Realm united. It is time to strive for our lost lands. Frisians, our kin and compatriots, shall be our first goal.
The port of Bergen-a Hanseatic kontor, and the last territory in Scandinavia outside our control. The port must be incorporated if we seek to unify Scandinavia. Let us send an offer to the owners.
The Danube has been an integral part of our nation for a millenium-and they shall be our next goal to be incorporated.
With our growing might we should make a push into the Orient-Those rich provinces will provide us the strength to push into Europa.
With our growing might we should make a push into the Levant-Those rich provinces will provide us the strength to push into farther Asia.

While our Standing army is the true cream of the crop, the size is lacking, to say the least. One suggested solution has been to incorporate the fractured militia into the army. While this will dilute the general quality of our troops, this will certainly bolster our numbers.

The current borders in the Rhine-Hesse region is a mess, to say the least. With medieval principalities scattered all over the map, it is no wonder one can travel between five states in a single day. It is time to call for a united Hesse-a strong state that can protect all its citizens! Glory to Hesse!
The Swabians are the closest kin in greater Germany for us Bavarians-uniting with them will strengthen both our people!
From the Alps to the Nordsee, the Rhineland shall be united! A single state would be a massive boost to our commerce, our military and our industry!
Sigmaringen and Augsburg-The two missing pieces to our united Swabian realm. No more, we call! We shall unite with those two states and finally proclaim a united Swabia!

In the late Medieval period, the union of Lublin was rejected between Poland and Lithuania due to meddling of the nobles. This was the greatest geopolitical failure in our history. Only uniting our two weak states is the solution to stopping the Russian and German tide. Glory to Poland-Lithuania!

Poland and Hungary has been historically cordial to each other-but we have never tried to unite our states. But the geopolitcal reality is that we cannot stand parted-it is time to unite our two states and finally proclaim Poland-Hungary!
Finally, we have conqueared much of Attica and can proclaim ourselves to be a proper state! Glory to us!

Ideas regarding the Zollverein-a custom union spanning the entirety of Germany-has existed for centuries. However, realpolitik and petty rivalries have stopped its development until now. Now that we have asserted ourselves as one of the formal leaders of Germany, we should take steps to finally implement it.
Whilest we were never part of the Holy Roman Empire, we cannot risk the isolation from us being outside of it. We shall formally ask the union states for entry.

Whilst the idea of an union of Coptic states has existed for centuries, realpolitik and petty rivalries have stopped its development until now. Now that we have asserted ourselves as the spiritual leader of the Coptic faith, we should take steps to finally implement it.
The port of Murano, whilst being a minor port for Venice, would be significantly strategic for our landlocked nation. We shall formally ask Venice for the purchase of it.
Now that a formal port has been acquired a port, we should build a formal colonial company for administartion of it.
Pomerania has been historically and culturally close to us. We should protect it from further Northern German aggression.
Pomerania has been historically and culturally close to us. We should protect it from further Northern German aggression.
Saarland-a land rich in Coal and Iron, and booming with commerce with its tributaries to the Rhine. It will be a great site for our nation's industrial development.

Switzerland historically has been wary of expansion. However, the lands of Tirol could be an exeption to that mantra-having close cultural ties and a government structure based on Cantons just like Switzerland, it would be an ideal site for integreation and expansion.

Anhalt and its surrounding regions were historically connected to us Saxons, but were eventually lost to history. Reclamation of these lost territories is the only answer to how to fix this historical misjustice.

The Sudetes and its surrounding regions were historically connected to us Saxons, but were eventually lost to history. Reclamation of these lost territories is the only answer to how to fix this historical misjustice.
We are a nation of the Alps, and we should unite all Swabians under our flag. We should expand along the mountains, in order to secure greater lands and population.

Named Magna Graecia, since Ancient times the Calabrian region has been heavily influenced by the Greeks. Even when the city states of Magna Graecia fell, the Hellenic influence has lingered until the modern age in Calabria just like us. Thus, we two provinces should be under one ruler-a true son of the Hellenic world!
Genoa has been devastated. Our victory is absolute and we are poised to impose our will upon them. And we shall choose to take the maximum amount of land that we can.

We need new land for our people, and the Tunisian coast seems like the best option. occupied by the Maghreb tribes, the fertile lands are being underutilized and are unproductive. Transplanting our landless people to those regions would do wonders to both our and the local economy.

Burgenland has always been a sore issue for our Austrian subjects. Lost to Matthias Corvinus, the German people still languish under Magyar rule. Recovering Burgenland would be a propaganda coup, and we will gain support from Austrian subjects like never before. We shall march to Sopron!
Further expansion must be conducted into the inner Maghreb if we seek to consolidate our holdings.

Swiss, Badenese, and Lorrainian. Three brother cultures, coming from the same routes. We must not continue to be split, and we will be much more stronger if we are together. We must unite under a single flag-the flag of Allemania!
Our brothers in Allemania-divided, weak, and in danger of Swabian expansion. We should take them under our wing for their interests, as well as ours.
Our brothers in Allemania-divided, weak, and in danger of Bavarian expansion. We should take them under our wing for their interests, as well as ours.

The Griko-the decendents of Magna Graecia, the sons and daughters of the Hellenic civilization. They unfortunately still suffer from discrimination and poverty within our nation, despite being as Syracusean as any other. That fact must change if we want to have a united, strong Syracuse.

The Greek populace-traditionally protected, prospered, yet still discriminated under our rule. While our rule has been certainly better than that of the Turk, we still can do much more. For our interests as well as theirs, it is well over time for us to accept them to be Venetian as much as any other.

The Greek populace has been under the Turkish Yoke for millenia. Saddled with Ottoman incompetance, their lands have been devastated and their economy has been lacking. We can do much better than that. Under our rule we can truly grant the Greeks well-deserved prosperity and growth.

The Misri people make up a substantial population within our nation, yet are subject to discrimination and prejudice. We can do much better than that. For our interests as well as theirs, it is well over time for us to accept them to be our citizens, as much as any other.

The isles of Britain already are smaller and underpopulated compared to the European mainland. Yet our petty squabbles dividing our islands make us even weaker. It is past time that we unite under a single flag-the flag of Britannia!

Swiss, Badenese, and Lorrainian. Three brother cultures, coming from the same routes. We must not continue to be split, and we will be much more stronger if we are together. We must unite under a single flag-the flag of Allemania!

Andalucian, Portuguese, Castillian, Galician, Catalan, Asturleonese, and Basque. All brother cultures, coming from the same routes. We must not continue to be split, and we will be much more stronger if we are together. We must unite under a single flag-the flag of Hispania!

Since their subjugation under Castillian rule, the historically Sevilla lands of Andalucia have become a backwater province in Spain. Poor, rural, and divided-it can do much better under our rule! We shall be the rulers of Andalucia!

Since their subjugation under Castillian rule, the historically Sevilla lands of Andalucia have become a backwater province in Spain. Poor, rural, and divided-it can do much better under our rule! We shall be the rulers of Andalucia!

We cannot continue the current status of us being boxed in by the Castillians. We must take the province of Cadiz, giving us a port in the Atlantic and greater avenues of expansion. Whatever the cost would be, we must seize Cadiz!

Since inheriting the Basque throne nominally after the death of Blanche the fifth, the Leonese have been traditionally the de jure rulers of the Basque. However, after the failure of multiple attempts of centralization, we have all but given up our rule of the province. With our rising might, we can take steps to integrate the province again-and finally remove that strategical blunder from the map.

If we seek to take lessons from history, one place to begin would be how to treat our Basque subjects. They are a proud people, and thinking that they would just accept our rule would be foolish. We shall take steps to show our coming benign rule and truly integrate the Basque as part of our nation.

The first Andalucian Caliphate fell because of continuous Portuguese raids. If we seek to truly declare ourselves the heir of Andalucia, we must reduce the Portuguese crown into merely a shadow, and remove that threat once and for all.

Another reason the Andalucian Caliphate fell was invaders from the Maghreb, especially from Tamasna. Expanding into regions such as Fez and Taza would be great steps to ensure that never happens again.

We have shown the world that we are a rising power. We have achieved prosperity and military strength. It is past time that we use that earned prestie for good use, and declare ourselves the true succesors of Al-Andalus!

Another reason the Andalucian Caliphate fell was invaders from the Maghreb, especially from Tamasna. Expanding into regions such as Fez and Taza would be great steps to ensure that never happens again.
With the growing population, our nation has the capacity to tame the wild plains and tundra of Kannata. Now, it is time to make those claims to be official.
With the growing population, our nation has the capacity to tame the wild plains and tundra of Kannata. Now, it is time to make those claims to be official.

Nouvelle Slesvig was one of the first colonies settled by Europeans in the New World. Historically and economically an important region, any nation whomst controls it can dominate the other in North Colombia.
Ha'il and Riyadh are the only populated regions in the Arabian desert able to be called a city. Excellent sites for our growing administration, they must be taken if we want to tame Arabia.

The lands of northern Italy are populated by one people, have a common market and an united economy, and protect each other. We are united in all but name. It is time to make that union formal and proclaim ourselves as a powerful state, able to stand up against other powers such as Naples, France and Bavaria.

Long ago the Seas of the Mediterranian have been ours. However, the Genoan pirates pilfered our rightful sea from us! Now that us Venetians have amassed enough power to challenge their domination, let us return to being an player in the Mediterranean Game

The Deserts of Fayyum and the Sahara el Beyda are strategical dangers to our state. With our control of those lands, we can never claim to fully protect our citizens from Maghrebi raids. We must establish outposts and garrisons to patrol that territory.
Mordredland needs resources for its economy, and Roimchoil can provide. Taking and developing the copper, iron and gold mines on our border would bring a great boon to our economy.

Since the conquest of William the great, Normandy and England has always had a close relationship. The cultural, economic, and commercial ties between us two regions cannot be ignored-and uniting our two regions would be a great step forward in expanding upon that relationship.

Brittany is populated by another branch of the Celts-the Bretons. Under constant pressure from their French overlords for assimilation, they yearn for independence and their own cultural identity. And we can provide it.

Galicia is populated by another branch of the Celts-the Galego. Under constant pressure from their Spanish overlords for assimilation, they yearn for independence and their own cultural identity. And we can provide it.

As the only pirate nation in the world we are not well regarded by many countries. But we can try to change that by putting ourselves at the service of the Acadiens. This way we would get protection, but they will gain more influence on our affairs. A price we are willing to pay, for our independence.

As the waves of German nationalism get higher and higher, demands of us uniting with our subject states and proclaiming ourselves as a candidate for unification have grown. As we do stand for gain from that arrangement, we should use this opportunity.

With the rising threat of Christians in our country have angered and worried our nobles. Some have suggested the Idea of expelling them to another continent-to South America. While this is certainly an extreme idea, this will solve all of our problems.
Annexation of the four border tribes

Since our independence, we have used auxiliary forces from the four border tribes of the Hopi, the Navajo, the O'odham, and the Zuni to guard our borders. However, our population has grown and now we do not need the additional troops. We shall march west and seize their lands instead.
We have proven ourselves to be worthy succesors to Byzantium and we will use the territorial claims from that successor status to our advantage.

We have beaten back the Chinese rebels, we have beaten back the Buyeo false Emperor. Now, we have proven ourselves as the rightful rulers of all Tibeto-Burmans, and we shall use our claim to strengthen our dominion
With our People and Nation always being stationed in the Himalaya mountains, we shall expand to take all of them
With our nomad ancestry we could go back to the plains where we come from
Our Nomad brothers stroll around in the desert and as we claimed the mountains and the plains, they are the only region we have right to push in

The revolt of the three Feudatories have resulted in a weakened Buyeo control of the Yangtze delta, a region close to the ports of Kaohsiung and Ke-lang. Thus, exploiting the lack of policing and further weakening the Buyeo, our merchants have started to conduct in the opium trade in the Yangtze delta. While this is highly immoral, nationalizing this trade will result in serious profits for our treasury. But is money worth angering the tiger?

We have beaten back the Chinese rebels, we have beaten back the Buyeo false Emperor. Now, we have proven ourselves as the rightful rulers of all Tibeto-Burmans, and we shall use our claim to strengthen our dominion

A land of Swamps and forests, Florida is a backwater province for the Acadiens-but the only mainland region we can even fathom to hold. We can pay to buy those lands-and finally solve a dispute between us two states.
A part of the Caribbean island chain, the island of Karib is of course part of our realm. It is time to end the rebel hold of the lands and finally unite the island chain.
Abolitionism, or the abolitionist movement, was the movement to end slavery. As calls for Abolitionism increase in our nation, it's time for us to abolish the inhuman practice of slavery
With our resurgent power we should bring back the Hanseatic kontors and bring back their merchants

Not so long ago,Cities like Nuevelle Paris and Sankt Johann have become so called 'New World Kontors' due to having Kontor-esque trading posts. Because both cities have become significant center of commerce, we could give them the title of Kontor
For a long time, Kontors have been extraterritorial lands which is not officially part of the Hanse.So while it rains and pours we should take whats ours and take some more!
Proclaim yourself King of the Gauls
Long have the Guals been struggeling under the Spaniards,Germans and the Dutch. They live in near Disapora except of course us.The Coranation is ready!
You, as king of the Gauls, should own all of the gallo-roman lands directly

The Alemana slaves in the Karib island, buffeted by their successful great revolt, have recently sailed to the lands north of our great river to punish their former masters. We should stabilize this wild north by subjugating it.
Czechs are Germans, but for long that has been in question as wee have been part of the Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation. We left it for being german ,but now is the time to return!

The Roman empire fell, the Byzantine empire fell only the Holy Roman empire is holding on ,barely.With us getting every german Nation under controll we can proclaim what should hav e been lost to time.Renovatio Imperii anyone?
The Saxons took Silesia away from us not so long ago. It has been in Bohemian hands for over half a millenia before
Bohemia has been part of the Holy Roman empire for so long, ist hard to remember it without it. So now with Bohemia in controll of Germans once again, we could integrate it into the second reich
These ancient lands are truly roman
Es ist Zeit den Palzern zu zeigen wie wir ihre Stadt sehen
We have seized the city of the world's desire! We shall rename it as further proof of our control.
We have seized the strategic Savoie region! We shall rename it as further proof of our control.
We have seized the strategic region of the Western Alps! We shall rename it with German names as further proof of our control.
We have seized the strategic region of the Western Alps! We shall rename it with French names as further proof of our control.
We have seized the prosperous region of Burgundy! We shall rename it with French names as further proof of our control.
We are now strong enough to retake the lands that were once under the rule of the Burmese Empire.
Even though the Shan Saw Bwars are loyal to the Burmese we have to give the less autonomy if we want a more centralized government. We shall directly control the Shan States from now.
Bavaria owns the Bohemian homeland and we should capitalize on this.
We have united all the Tibeto-Burmans under our dynasty. We shall form the Tibeto-Burman Union
We have united all the Tibeto-Burmans under our dynasty. We shall form the Tibeto-Burman Union
The Carnolian lands have been historically part of our domain, but the Cilli counts have pilfered it from us. We should take action to rectify that historical mistake.
The East Frisian lands have been historically part of our domain, but the Dutch have pilfered it from us. We should take action to rectify that historical mistake.
We lost our beautiful capital of Venice so it doesn't make sense we call ouself the Venetian Republic.How about Republic of San Marco?
We lost our capital of Genoa so it doesn't make sense we call ouself the Genoese Republic.How about Tirrenian Republic?
Venice is once again part of our nation ,we can finally return to former glory and rename ourself to Venice once again
Genoa is once again part of our nation ,we can finally return to former glory and rename ourself to Genoa once again

The Kazakh steppes has always posed a problem to Russia. Countless Hordes have occupied it since time immemorial, and have raided greater Russia based from it. However, the tables have turned. The Nogai horde are now all but our subjects, and we have the authority to lay claim to their hinterlands. To Uralsk!
Russia needs more land for her people, and the Kazakh rump state stands open for colonization. We shall abolish the failing monarchy and build the Governorate of the Steppes to serve all of Russia.

Bukkhara is too rich of a land for it to be languishing under the backwards monarchy. The khan can be bribed with an estate and some gold, and we shall add the lands into the Governorate of Central Asia.
The rump state of Transnistria has been continuously failing the Ruthenyan population it claims to rule over. That comes to an end today. We shall claim Transnistira once and for all.

Bryansk has always been a sore point between Russia and Lithuania. With Smolenskians making up the majority of the rural population, the Lithuanian urban majority with the Ruthenyans weighing in on thier side has been the only obstacle in our control of the region. Now that we own White Ruthenia, that territory can be integrated into our realm.

Azov has always been on the site for us. Tho a minor port for world standards, it is the only port in the Black sea that has been at least cordial with us. With increasing control over the hinterlands, now finally may be the moment to make the move.
Russia needs more land to grow, and the rump state of Nogai seems like our best bet. Russian immigration into their lands have already started, and we will make sure it continues.

Ruthenyans make up the vast majority of our population, but are treated like second class citizens. This cannot continue. We must stem Ruthenyan nationalism if we want to survive as a nation, and the first step is to treat them equally as $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens.

Hungary and Poland cannot stand separated. While Poland may be weaker than Bavaria and the wider German sphere and Hungary is weaker than Venice, we are stronger together. A commonwealth of Poles, Lithuanians, and Ruthenyans can challenge any great power!
For as long as any alive can remember, we Amazonians have been fragmented and fragile, but if we wish to resist the intrusion we face, we must be united. Together, as one!
Our vassal in Mesopotamia has been an important part of our emprie and with our increasing push for centralization , we should start with them
Our might has been weakened and there is only one reason for it.Our decentralizatrion is at fault
Its time to centralize more and more of our Nation
Our vassal in Arabia has been an important part of our emprie and with our increasing push for centralization .We should start with them
With the Aragonese in our Hands ist time to annex them and make them an integral part of our nation
Whilest we aren't part of the empire, with our geographical and cultural location they cannot reject this offer
Our Realm is strong and has room for expansion.With many Burgundians in our dominion we could go after their kingdom
With Burgundy secured.We need to secure more french ,but geographically important lands.
Luxembourg has long threatened our western german hemogony and have claims on the Saar
Our Dominion and Realm are the most secxure in Europe, the northern Border isnt very defendable.Lets fix that!
We have consolidated our heart lands.Let's get some more 'heart land'
With our capture of Ingriya we can finally return to our former selfs
Looks like the English are having a civil war, if the Westminsters win we will have a Dutch puppet on our border, we can't let this happen. Send Supplies to England!
Almost all Saxon lands are now under our rule, the only ones left is  pesky Brandenburg
For long , the Bishoprics of german descend have been disunited.Its has come time to change that.
We already are the strongest in the Central Columbia region so why not unify it?
Us and the pirates share a common enemy, The Genoense, we should work together and beat them.
As we lost Norway, we have no right to call ourselves 'Denmark-Norway' anymore
There are Danes over in Holstein who aren't being represented by the Hanseatic government.WE should Liberate them
We need to have a stronghold in Germany to show our german Hegemony
There stre finns under Russin oppresion over in Karelia, we need to protect them!
This option enables non-Dynamic revolts, as they rarely happen.This option does NOT disable Dynamic Revolts
With growing german national sentiment we shopuld do something oursself

As the events of Satsuma shock have shown, there is ample benefits to be had from learning from our southern colony of Sainantan. From their surprisingly advanced military to their economy, we have much to learn. Breaking from tradition, we shall issue an edict on the movement of Daimin Gokuo, or "Ask the people, inform the Emperor".
We lost our former home lands, we don't deserve our name...
We lost our former home lands, we don't deserve our nameâ¦
We lost our former home lands, we don't deserve our nameâ¦
We lost our former home lands, we don't deserve our nameâ¦
Our two Nations are so similar ,that it makes sense to merge both states into one
Our two Nations are so similar ,that it makes sense to merge both states into one
Our two Nations are so similar ,that it makes sense to merge both states into one
Our two Nations are so similar ,that it makes sense to merge both states into one
Our downfall was seen as inevitable ,but now we can finally stop this downfall and start to rise again!
Those Ehiopians are trying to expand into the middle east, we should stop them before they get too far.
We will conquer Egypt. Our ancesters had fail to conquer Egypt and we will conquer it now.
With our conversion and return of the Germans to our nation we shouzld teach the remaining czechs and germans that bohemian is the new way to go
Long have we been confined to this lake in the middle of nowhere.This nowhere should be our border
With the new lands under our control, we should start integrating them into Nova Roma
With the new lands under our control, we should start integrating them into Nova Roma
We need to project our power and restore the empire to Glory, this time in Africa
Us northerners have had a weird relationship with eachother, being close in culture and language, more than the Francien.
For too long our laws have been messy, confusing and sometimes even contradictory each other. It's time for to reorganize our legislation into an ordered collection
With our conquest of the czechs many new commers have entered our realm.They sadly do not speak German which should change this instant
We should gain the entire baltic and not just former Ortelsburg
The Slavs are unhappy and they will continue to revolt as long as we don't do anything. We should protect them and only them. We're sure the others won't mind.
The Dalmatians don't fit in.They speak a slavic language that doesn't fit in our greko-veneto empire.So let's integrate them by teaching our language
We are now gaining control of Doleh
We are now gaining control of Elem Ifoko
We are now in control of Minamiosumi
We are now in control of Adale
We are now in control of Sur Masrirah
There are Toledans living in southern Leon who should be part of our empire.
Granada simply shouldn't exist it should have died centuries ago and now, too late I might add, we should conquer and convert them.
The Islands have been under Genoese controll for a while and are acually part of Hispania, not Italy.So we could suggest to buy them.

The Administrative Zone of the City of Venice ends at the Sea, but our poeple are populating that sea, over populating.Its becoming hard to conduct trade and industrialize becaue of it.We could expand the Administrative zone of the City of Venice over to the coastal city Maghera.

While we thought the Germans in our lands were similar enough to us to assimilate with ease, it appears that has not been, and will likely never be the case. As such, after long deliberation between the country's higher ups, it has been decided that the best way forward is to simply embrace the Germans in our lands, it may even create room for expansion!
After Irish ones it's time for the English nobles to give up part of their power.
After Northern Irish ones it's time for the English nobles to give up part of their power.

The estuaries of the Biobio river have one of the most rich coal reserves in the world. As we seek to modernize, these reserves cannot be passed over. We shall send european experts and our best miners to exploit the reserves at once.

While the land distributions of the prior Sapa Incas had helped the local farmers in the south, the north-especially in the Quito region-has yet to see the benefits, due to improper implementation of the policy and lack of political will. This changes today. We shall help the farmers to own their own plots of land and modernize their production.

New mines, new farms, new industry, new jobs. The past economic progress has been a true boon to our nation, and we seek to continue that prosperity. With the final financial and fiscal reforms, we will set our nation on the path to an even greater future!

The Iwakura Mission or Iwakura Embassy was a Japanese diplomatic journey around the world, initiated in $YEAR$ by the oligarchs of the Meiji period. Although it was not the only such ""mission"", it is the most well-known and possibly most important for the modernization of Japan after a long period of isolation from the West. It was first proposed by the influential Dutch missionary and engineer Guido Verbeck and was probably based on the model of the Grand Embassy of Peter I. The purposes of the mission were twofold: To renegotiate the unequal treaties with the Great Powers that Japan had been forced into during the previous decades and to gather information on education, technology, culture, and military, social and economic structures from the countries visited in order to effect the modernization of Japan.

We have many minorities in our empire who are currently demanind more local autonomies more governing power. Despite the need to centralize the government, it is necessnary to avoid risking our border regions to rebel.
Declare a Law of Human Rights

As liberalist ideology is getting more popular among minorities in Frnace, we shall create a law that ensure fundamental human rights to everyone. By making some concessions toward these minorities, we could avoid a massive rebellion. However, backlash is expected from the Ile-de-France, as they will lose some privileges.

By embracing egalitarian ideals, our nation shall be a better one. It doesn't matter if you are either French, Arpitan, Burgundian, Breton, Belgican, or Occitan, for we all live in the same country - France. Sadly, many conservative and reactionary will be angered by this radical change.

It's time to declare the French Federation, a nation free and independent from tyranny of a monarch, free to speak their language in their homelands. Minorities will be guaranteed to have equal rights, and local autonomy will be protected.
We have minorities that are unlawful and demand more autonomy. We cannot do this.We need to centralize our power despite their demands.
The minorities still demand more power in government but that doesn't mean we need to give them that, right?
The streets have become silent. Order is the norm in our politics. It has truly become our national value.
It has been silentâ¦  The Orderâ¦. We need full Order and obeying Peopleâ¦ In Private, Public and Political lifeâ¦
To return to our former glory, we have to also regain our power in the Mediterranian. The Levant is a great start to do so
Egypt was proudly roman.So much even that they kept their weird greekified language.Its time to get them back to the empire
To fulfill our destiny we need close to full Mediterranian domination and the Barbary Coast is a great place to do that
Our last Destination.Italia or at least the south of it.
Long Rome has been lost but stll present in the minds of its succesors, buried under the sands of time but Rome is eternal. ROMA AETERNA!
With our war concluded we can finally poudly say, We are the true France
Loango is our smaller and weaker neighbour.They are basically Congo 2 but there can only be one.
Lunda is currently the biggest threat to us and we should just conquer them
In our persuit to unite the Bantus, we have to go and also go conquer the Bantus south of us.
Our Lands are broad and they still need to be broadened as long as there are still Bantu people living in opression
The people behind Kale Tangyika are Bantu too and need Protection
Never have the Bantu's been united.Its time to fix that!
We took back our homeland from the Chinese, now we'll rename the cities to what we used to called them.
Our nation represents all the british people and their claims and ideals, therefore we have the right to indentify ourselves as the heirs of the Angevin Empire.
Take the title of King of France

Now that we have retaken the French duchies we can reorganize them into the Title of Kingdom of France, angering the Bourbons but also making us more likeable in the eyes of the population of the newly conquered territory.
To better connect our territories we can use ambiguous maps and documents to claim a part of England.
Our low German borthers need to be under our controll
The Dutch and the low Germans are so closely related, we very well could be one people.Why not?We need to protect our brothers
The Low Germans and the Dutch are finally united!
Nouvelle Slesvig is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use French names.
Nee Sleswyk is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use German names.
Nouvelle France is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use French names.
Nee Holsteen is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use German names.
Appalaches are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use French names.
Appalaches are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use German names.

The current capital city of Nouvelle Paris is too close to the Akino-League border. This could cause us some problems in a future conflict with them. Therefore we should move our capital to the more central and southern city of Boisselot.
Many people are creating associations with the goal of conserving Gaelic language and culture. It's time to decide how to deal with the Gaelic issue

Let's make Gaelic an official language of our nation alongside English. This will create some bureucratic problems in the first times but it will make easier for us to integrate the Gaelic populations of the North and it could be a test for an eventual union of the Celt people. The Gaelics are only troublemakers and they just obstacle our goals of greatness. We will inititate a plan to assimilate their culture on multiple fronts such as propaganda campaigns and forced separation of childrens from their families. Â§RThis is needed to form BritanniaÂ§

With our devastated civil war concluded, we can finally proudly say we are the rightful government to rule England. It's time to reintegrate the seceded countries and purge all remnants of the Monarchists.

French: With our devastated civil war concluded, we can finally proudly say we are the rightful government to rule England. It's time to reintegrate the seceded countries and purge all remnants of the Republicans.

English: Bulgaria triumphs over the Ottoman Empire and has thus achieved it's independence. Having already defeated the destabilised Ottoman state once, we will lay claim to the Macedonian lands, historically inhabited by Bulgarians and shall defeat them once more!

Some of our intelligentsia claim that Bulgaria should claim lands up to the Morava river in Serbia in order to establish a natural boundary. Bulgaria now finds itself in a position where that is achievable.
Thrace, a region with significant Bulgarian population still finds itself under foreign rule. With our powerbase in the region growing we can consider taking it over. Onwards to Tsarigrad!

Since the death of the last member of House Bourbon-Naples in 1844, the throne of our kingdom remained empty. We should invite the most illustrious dynasties of the realm to partecipate in a great council, so we can discuss who shall become the new King of Naples.
We cannot stand behind our western Rivals. We shall construct Modern Manufacturies in our Capital, those that can rival the industrial copmlexes in Paris and Lubeck
The Partition of the Empire was a grave mistake-and today we will rectify that decision! Glory to Rome!
Gekkers nor Veldeuwers can stand alone. A house divided against itself cannot stand, and we shall be the ones that unite it!

The Ancien Regime has fallen-and our new government will rise like a Phoenix from its ashes. Already, regions are recognizing our rule and taxes are beginning to flow in. Now we can start on the long road for recovery! Vive la France!

Neumark has been part of the Teutonic Order for ages-a sad relic of the Medieval past. As a exclave of their lands, the people suffer economically and politically. We shall send an offer of monetary compensation for those lands-not just for our benefit, but for their subjects too.
A separate identity has risen during the war-A identity strictly non-French. We are not French, and we are proud of it!
As Saarland rises, the rest of the Rhineland wonders our prosperity and desires to join us. We should make that the reality.
THE SAAR EMPIRE RISES! ALL SHALL BECKON AT OUR MIGHT!
The lands of Andalucia has sadly been completely overrun with Maghreb tribes and Muslim converters-a completely unacceptable condition. We will deal with these "Mozarabics" once and for all.
With our victory over the Genoese army, now we can finally proclaim our own identity!
While our revolution marches forward in our islands, the old lands of Liguria are still in turmoil and in the shackles of the Ancien Regime. It is finally time to correct that misjustice.

Mallorca-The island chain to our east. Since their conquest of the islands, the Genoese have using it as their base of commerce in the Western Mediteranian. Now that the Genoans are in turmoil, we can seize the island chains and finally unite our lands, and the extra commerce will be a welcome addition to our economy.
The French people in our lands cannot be trusted-as they have proven to us while they were oppressing our people during their rule. Only their expulsion can secure our hold over the new territories!

Lithuania Proper was historically constituted of five regions-Samogitia, AukÅ¡taitija, DzÅ«kija, Suvalkija, and Lithuania Minor which was unfortunately lost to the Baltic German colonization. Today, that historical unjustice will be corrected-All five regions will proudly be Lithuanian again!

The Pirate wars have devastated the Genoese republic-Our historical rival. Jingoists within our Senato are demanding that we take action in this historical opportunity-and it will be foolish to go against their wishes. We shall demand that all their remaining colonies are given to us with the threat of war.
The war between the two Merchant republics of Italia has been concluded. Now, it is time to dictate the peace.
The war between the two Merchant republics of Italia has been concluded. Now, it is time to dictate the peace.

Arpitania has historical, cultural, and economical ties to our Burgundian realm. Now that the French Rulers are gone and the region is in Anarchy, an opportunity has risen for us to finally install our rightful rule to that region.
The Tribes of the desert are slowly accepting our rule-and showing our military might will certainly help that progress. The Sahara will be ours!

The Ancien Regime has fallen-and our new government will rise like a Phoenix from its ashes. Already, regions are recognizing our rule and taxes are beginning to flow in. Now we can start on the long road for recovery! Vive la France!
The Sahara is aching for our holy rule-and we are capable of delivering it. The East will be ours!
The Holy city of Mecca is now within our grasp. The prestige of taking Mecca and Medina will be astronomous-And we will achieve it.

The Holy cities are now within our grasps. The world beckons at our might, and the Ummah looks upon us for guidence. Now, it is time for us to take up the mantle of the new Caliphate-The Ummah will be protected by us.

The Tiniri sultanate is one of the more unrealistic ideas of the mod. It spawns a civilized Muslim Caliphate that can take over the Islamic world and secedes everyone's owned provinces in a large area below Algeria and around Timbuktu. This can be annoying if you are playing a colonial game so, if you want this to exist for some reason, here is an option to enable it.
We have united all the Tai people in South East Asia. We shall form the Suvarnabhumi Empire
Even though the Siamnese are Tai we have a history of fighting each other we should unite all the Tai people in South East Asia
Even though the Lao people are Tai we have a history of fighting each other we should unite all the Tai people in South East Asia
The lands that we're once populated by the Tais are now controlled by the Chinese. We will take back our homeland.
The Shans are out Tai brother they're now under the Tibeto-Burmans rule we will liberate them from the Tibeto-Burmans!
Having achieved dominion over the Friedensland desert we must continue to safeguard the Karib sea as our people's own.

We have brought the Ngabe and Miskito, the last surviving Kolumbian tribes, under our protection. We cannot stop with them, however, for the Afro-Caribeno freed slaves of the Jesuits inhabit the southern Karib Coast. Claiming their lands will truly make us rulers of the Karib Sea

The Karib Islands are rich in cash crops and reasonably densely populated. They pose a high strategic importance, allowing for the control of regional trade and increasing naval supply and travel range if we are to assert control over them.
After the long opression by the people, its now our time to join them and unite the german people
Toledo and Leon once stood united in Iberia, but differences tore us apart.Its time to return to a time before I did that mistake happened

Immediately to our North and North East can be found the Gascons. Once, they were pure Euskarrans like us. Then, they fell under the oppression of the Latin Occitans, who have over the years slowly but surely been dragging their minds and hearts away from us. We cannot let this happen any longer! We must rescue them from the latinate perversions, for no true Euskarran stands alone. ALL FOR ONE AND ONE FOR ALL!
London is the most important city of England but it has been heavily damaged by the civil war. Now we have the capabilities of rebuilding it as long as we have a good funding.
We have greatly rebuilt London but the rest of urban England is still heavily damaged and hasn't fully recovered but we have the economic capabilites to do an extraordinary rebuilding plan

The Min chinese gave us many good things: gunpowder, the printing press, masonry, shipbuilding, and of course, our national borders. Our good memory of them is why we are the only Japonic state aside from Ryukyu that embraces Chinese people. It is thus unwise and dishonorable to leave the Min homelands alone and undefended within mainland China. Their rapacious Hakka and Yue neighbors, as well as the Mandarin blob being directed from Dadu threaten to destroy their beautiful culture. We will not let that happen!

Having solidifed our protection of the Min homeland, we look to their southwest, to their longtime frenemies, the Yue Chinese. While we have no negative memories of them, we have no positive memories of them either, and taking their lands would significantly increase our control of the South China Sea.

Andalucian, Portuguese, Castillian, Galician, Catalan, Asturleonese, and Basque. All brother cultures, coming from the same routes. They must not continue to be split, and they will be much more stronger if they are together. They must unite under a single flag-the flag of Hispania!

Having liberated the Holy Land from its long subjugation under the yoke of Muhammad, we can extend citizenship rights to our Semitic co-religionists, the grandnephews and grandnieces of our Lord who speak the language he spoke and live in the environment he did as a human being
NOTE: THIS WILL MAKE YOU NOLONGER FORM GERMANY, With our great Republic we can finally secure our position as the Merchant League of all peoples
Now our time has come to Unite the league into a centralized state with exact Borders
With our rise from the ashes the french pheonix may rise to our true strength from the Rhine to Barcelona!
We long beared the name of our ancestors, the Lotharingians also known as Lorraine or Lothringen.Its time to be true to our name and reform Lotharingia as the true heirs of Lothar
Return of the true Empire, as Lothar did we bear the crown of the empire and are the heirs of the Carolingians

Our crown colony of New Scotland used to be crucial for our trade routes. Since their independence in 1798 our influence has waned although on paper we have access to a portion of their market. It's time to send a military expedition over and enforce full control over the former colony.

Our great general, Bhimsen Thapa, has, after much hard work, created a unified military doctrine for our soldiers. With this, our Gorkhas will be just as stout under fire, supply-stingy and experienced as the famed Punjabis are.

The Germanic peoples of Colombia have been brought together under the banner of Freiland, whether through force of arms or more peaceful means the future of this continent is in our hands. To a bright future together!

The last German state in Colombia has at last been united with their brothers to the south, once a dominant power of the continent their industrial base and large population will provide many benefits to our republic.

With the unification of the German colombian states we can now settle the hinterlands not yet under our control with little resistence, any natives or other powers in the region shall surely back down.

Kolumbia and its predecessor Freiland were founded in the fires of the destruction of slavery, yet the only other power on this continent still practices it. We shall crush the Acadiens for freedom, to the end of Tyranny!

With the destruction of the Amoucadien nation it is clear their barbaric slave based culture must be destroyed. From this day forth and forevermore the French language and customs shall be banned within the state of Kolumbia, may their ways die with slavery!

Gibraltar, Ceuta and Mellila the ports parting our holdings. Since their conquest of the region, the Genoese have using them as their bases of commerce in the Western Mediteranian. Now that the Genoans are in turmoil, we can seize the ports and finally unite our lands, and the extra commerce will be a welcome addition to our economy.
After our liberation of the Holy Land and the entire eastern Roman Empire as a whole, its now our chance to unite our heads of states on our way to unite the catholic church
Now that all our states have been united, it's now time to fully unite the catholic church in the state of the Holy Order

At the dawn of yoruba civilization stand Ife, the first city and from which our culture spread.Its the historic and religious capital of the Yoruba and truly our first empire.It stood long and strong, but in the middle of the 17th century it fell apart and it collapsed in on itself, ending true Yoruban hegemony in the Niger-Benue-Ogun Lands, allowing the Songhai to conquer the Kwa and the Hausa, that was the worst mistake that could have been made so lets redeam ourselfs and return to true Yoruba hegemony
The duchy in the North has been part of our influence for a long time.Now the time has come to unite the Coast
The Sorbs shall return to greatness
With most of the German peoples under our will and influence, we can shape their political configuartions in our will and paint the map without acual reprecoussions

The Nguni people have historically been divided, but if we are to survive the upcoming decades, we must unite as one. We have achieved that through our force of will, now it is time for our people to recocgnize this
With our recent re-incorporation of many cultures into our realm, it is time to give them equal status to our german population
With our recent re-incorporation of many cultures into our realm, it is time to give them equal status to our german population
Playing with just -0.1 infamy reduction can get a bit slow. Why not spice it up a bit?
Our growing power must extend beyond the Carpathians!

The liberation of the poor whether Basque, Catalan or Spanish, is a commandment from God. This is the truth which the corrupt landed Basque clergy and nobility tried to hide from us, and it is the truth their supporters in Aragon and Leon try to take from us. Thankfully, we have God's favor in this struggle. Fight bitterly to preserve our equality, brothers!

Gennaro Pallavicino, Merchant-Governor of our largely agricultural colony of Leonardia, has sent us the most exciting news: Coal has been discovered in the colony's old capital of Ca'Rezzonico, and he seeks our permission to develop the island into a productive mining district.

We brave children of Hadramaut have only one reason to suffer the hatred of the Saban Sea Nomads: deriving profit. Despite this single minded objective, technology has limited our past reach such that the Japanese halfbreeds and the dying Sultan in Brunei were able to snatch a few other livable ports from us. Thankfully however, advances at home have opened a new profit opportunity to us: establishing a fortified village on the settlement our kind subjects call Semporna, and hope that their fishing economy will eventually become something more valuable. Hopefully, the Japanese Halfbreeds and the Bruneians are not offended by this

With most of previously-free Sabah now divided between us and the Japanese halflings, the time has come to seal the mountain village of Tongod from the coast by taking the last strip of uncolonized land
French: the coastal village of Lahad Datu. It must be noted, though, that doing so, will anger the Japanese halfbreeds, to the point that they will likely declare war on us to unite the East Saban region under their singular rule.

English: With most of previously-free Sabah now divided between us and the Overseas Arabians, the time has come to seal the mountain village of Tongod from the coast by taking the last strip of uncolonized land
French: the coastal village of Lahad Datu. It must be noted, though, that doing so, will anger the Overseas Arabians, to the point that they will likely declare war on us to unite the East Saban region under their singular rule.

English: Offer to Purchase the Isles of Scilly

With the Merchant Republic of Genoa in crisis, their trade empire is collapsing around them. Already, several islands once considered integral territory have revolted against their thalassocratic rule. With whispers of a liberal revolution in the grand city of Genoa itself looming on the horizon, the time seems ripe to correct a bizarre misprint on the map and return the Isles of Scilly to Wales. Surely those rocky outcroppings thousands of kilometers away from home ports aren't worth adding a new enemy to Genoa's current troubles?
Scilly is once again under native Celtic rule, and so must have its foreign name replaced with its celtic name
Intervene in the English Civil War!

Our once feared neighbor has split herself in two, fighting brother against brother over the ideals of constitutional and absolute monarchy. Not only does the King in Westminster oppose our liberal ideals, he oppresses our cultural kin in Cornwall and covets our own homeland for his domain. Although our army is scarcely half as large as his, the forces of England and Westminster are already fairly evenly matched. If we strike now, we can tip the balance of this conflict in our favor, freeing our brothers and imposing a debt on the English Parliamentarians for handing them the victory.
We shall accept the Africans in our nation
We have many Christians in our realm, we have been tolerating them for long but we have reason to suggest that they are hurting our nation in the long run.

Calumburgh has been the capital of Mordredland ever since the declaration of independence from Scotland in 1798. The most important city of the country is still a backwards one compared to the rest of the civilized capitals. If we are to become a succesful nation in the new world we must renovate our capital.

For years our hard earned trade revenues are being stolen by the merchants of Scotland. Upon Mordredland's independence, the June Accords served as a quick way to finish the war in exchange for mercantile concessions. However, as the economy grew and possible trade partners were kept away from us, the restrictions imposed were found opressive and unfit for a growing regional economy. This cannot continue, therefore we must try and negotiate the issue with Scotland.

With the monarchy ousted, and the democratic government here to stay, our parliament has put forth a proposal. They propose the enactment of the Tirsinns Law or the Law of Free Birth, named after its champion, Prime Minister Finlay Smith, Viscount of Tirsinns. The law would provide freedom to all newborn children of slaves, and slaves of the state or crown. Slaveholders of the children's parents were to provide care for the children until the age of 21, or turn them over to the state in return for monetary compensation.

The Hinterland regions of the South Colombian continent on our border are sparsely settled by natives and have several Mordredish outposts established in them already. The Mordredish government can now aim to establish formal control over the borderland.
Having overcame the French threat down south nothing stands in our way of launching an expedition into the southern hinterland ripe for settlement.
We have taken hold of the lost Scottish colonial lands. The old Scottish names shall be restored.
We have managed to reclaim our land from Mordredland. Now we must restore the french names.
We shall introduce new names for our recently acquired holdings in the Amazon.

It is the destiny of our people to settle and exploit the rich lands of South Columbia. With the onslaught of new European immigrants ready to fill the workforce gaps in our ever growing economy we are able to greatly expand our grip over the continent. The Amazon's and vast other lands and resources must be secured and settled by Mordredland! All will tremble beneath our boot!

Climate conditions and terrain have caused the inland areas of Mordredland to lack behind in development and population unlike the coastal ones. With the advent of new farming equipment we can improve the farming conditions and attract immigrants by giving out land to anyone willing to settle, from and outside of our country.
Having tamed the sparse steppes and Guarani peoples of Congaltonia it is time to settle our people there in order to civilize it. Nothing stands on the Mordredish path of civilization!

For centuries the Afro-Scottish community in our nation faced discrimination and oppression. Now, with slavery gone for good and the democratic government in charge for decades it is in order to accept our African community.

For the sake of easier governance Ireland has been split into two in the past. Ulster, the northern part has been kept under direct British control while the rest of the island has been granted limited autonomy. But no more! We must end this arrangement in order to achieve complete dominance over the British Isles! Surely nothing bad will come of this?

Istria and Dalmatia are ours once more after centuries of Venetian rule and oppression. It is now time to sign the Second Treaty of Zadar and force the Venetians to lay off their claims on our beautiful coastline.
The Primorje region of Slovenia is now free from Italian rule. It is time to force the Italians to renounce their claims and rid the region of their influence.

The idea of a Croatian Slovenia finds it's roots within the ideology of the Croatian Party of Rights (HSP) and the Illyrian movement. The movement was created in the Kingdom of Hungary back in the early 19th century by young Croatian intellectuals as part of a series of measures to revive the Croatian National identity. These intellectuals, cooperating alongside many Slovene members, claimed that the Slovenes were in fact Croats who merely just spoke a different dialect before the language standardization. This gives us a valid enough reason to incorporate Slovenia into our nation and eventually unite our lexicon.

The eastern lands outside of our boundaries hold both historical and cultural significance to Croatia. Backa region for instance has a large Croatian minority inhabiting it together with the Bosnian borderland, where Croatian client states were present back in the day. Therefore, we shall lay claim over these historically important regions of Croatia!

Stanko Vraz, a prominent writer from Slovenia with popular support, advocates for the linguistic and national unity of Croatia. The inhabitants of Slovenia are nothing more than Alpine Croats who speak a different dialect. Considering this, the Sabor shall institute a series of measures to teach the standardized Croatian language based on the shtokavian dialect, not only across Slovenia but also Dalmatia in order to integrate the Italian minority.

The Croatian Academy of Sciences and Arts (HAZU) was an institution established in the 2nd half of the 19th century in Zagreb. The Academy was established by the Sabor on the incentive of akovo bishop Josip Juraj Strossmayer for the preservation and development of Croatian arts and culture.

Croatia stands triumphant as the dominant Balkan power, having taken over all of the regions inhabited by croats or historically significant to it. Now we are must pursue even greater goals! Janko Draskovic, the first Croatian national revivalist, wrote in his work from 1832 "Disertacija" of a potential federation of Southern Slavs led by the Croats. Although his plans were originally to unite only the Southern Slavs in the regions of Slovenia, Croatia and Bosnia, we can greatly expand upon his ideas and utilise them. The Slavic spirit shall live on for ages!

There still lives the word of our grandfathers that all South Slavs shall be free. In Dobrudja and Thrace large Bulgarian communities inhabit like in the rest of our great nation. The Sun will shine over the Southern Slavs under the banner of Yugoslavia when the day of liberation comes, for those lands shall be liberated.

The Albanians are a small and endangered ethnic group in the southwestern Balkans, facing hardships under Ottoman rule for centuries. On the other hand, Albania's location makes for a key strategic point as it stands at the entrance into the Adriatic Sea, allowing anyone who owns the region to control the flow of goods. Albania needs to be safeguarded, both for their own safety and for our interests in the Balkans.
Stefan's Legacy has been reclaimed and all historic Serbian lands have been secured under our rule once more. It is time to proclaim the Serbian Empire! ivjela Srbija!

Kalabria and Siilia are home to a large Albanian minority, called the Arbresh. Following Skanderbeg's death in 1468, Albania was no longer able to fend for itself and quickly fell victim to Ottoman conquests. This sparked mass migrations of Albanians across the strait of Otranto into Southern Italy who ended up mass converting to catholicism, in turn creating the Arbrisht identity. It is our duty to liberate the Arbresh in order to achieve a truly united Albania!

The famous and honourable city of Skoplje in Macedonia used to be one of the three historical capitals of Serbia. Skoplje is also where the Serbian king Stefan Duan was crowned emperor of the Serbs and Greeks back in 1346. Considering the central location and historical significance it shall once again be the Serbian capital!

The medieval Bosnian state used to be one of our client states led by Ban Tvrtko Kotromanic up until the inevitable fall of the Serbian Empire. After the Empire's collapse due to continued Ottoman conquests, Tvrtko proclaimed himself King of Bosnia and secured himself an alliance with Lazar Hrebeljanovic, ruler of the disintegrated Serbian state. Tvrtko went on to establish rule over Zeta and Dalmatia before his eventual death in 1391. The Hungarian crown seized this opportunity and in 1394 entered conflict with the new King Dabia whose state ended up fully subjugated. With this, the claims on Tvrtko's Bosnia shall be relinquished.

The lands encompassing greater Bulgaria used to be dependent on the Serbian Empire during the era of Ottoman conquests. With Ottoman influence waning and our nation stronger than ever it would be time to establish direct rule over the Bulgarian lands!

Tsar Stefan Duan proclaimed himself as Emperor of the Serbs and Greeks, thoughbeit this never came around as being entirely true considering that many Greek lands in Europe were still under foreign rule. The renewed Serbian Empire shall therefore continue Duan's conquests in order to secure the antique lands of Greece!

The programme of a United Slovenia was first formulated by Matija Majar, a Slovene priest from Carinthia. His program was published in the national conservative newspaper Kmetijske in rokodelske novice which promptly contributed to the spread of his idea. Key points of the program mentioned the unification of all Slovene lands and opposition to Croatian ambitions of integrating Slovenia.

Thervingia is a petty country while on the contrary it's population is abundant and in constant search of new lands to call home. The territories in close vicinity of the Donau were often subject to settlement of Vesier merchants and other lower class peoples from our nation over the decades. As a consequence of these continued migrations, the concept of Grovesierland (literally Greater Thervingia) was idealised by a group of young Vesier intellectuals. Grovesierland envisions the expansion of Thervingia over into neighbouring lands where the Vesi settlers reside, uniting all Vesi under one banner. Donau's flow is in Thervingian hands!

Ever since the start of the great decline of Ottoman influence and the declaration of the Turkish Republic, elite military regiments called the Janissaries have been causing trouble across the country. Now that we are at peace we can start stabilising the country and with that hunt down these enemies of the state.

We are Greeks, not Romans nor Turks! We are the birthplace of Democracy and were the center of learning in antique times. All would look up to Greece but today we are only a shadow of our former selves. We must uphold the ideals of Democracy and start investing in our learning institutes, in turn becoming the lead example of a succesful Democratic nation just like Athens was.

Once more, as years and time go by, once more they shall be ours! The lands of Asia Minor have been settled by Greeks since antique times. Although the Anatolian hinterlands are long lost, with little to no Greeks inhabiting them, a claim could be fairly staked to the still predominantly Greek Aegean coast. Now that Greece is independent at last it would only make sense to liberate our brothers across the Hellespont.

The Turks have been driven out of the Aegean Coast after a decisive war where we defeated their forces. Now we ought to force the Turks to renounce their claims on our rightful lands by signing the Treaty of Smyrna!

The Hellenic Navy calls for improvement so as to guard the Aegean Coasts as well as uphold our democratic values. Constructing the Great Shipyard of Smyrna, a wonder envisioned by our greatest of architects, would lead the way for Greek ship building across the Aegean. It would likewise revitalise Smyrna's economy whilst simultaneously preparing the Hellenic Navy for the liberation of Magna Graecia.

Back in antique times when the booming Greek population exceeded the capacity of its arable land, brave colonists set out across the Mediterranean in search of new places to call home. One of these was Magna Graecia or Megle Hells as it was called in Greek. The Colony was founded just across the Ionian Sea and had lots of desirable fertile lands which helped sustain all of Greece proper's agricultural needs for centuries. Seeing as there still is a substantial Greek presence in the region we shall set sail and reclaim the Breadbasket of Hellas!

Hellenic rule hath been restored over the ancient colony of Magna Graecia, famous for it's vast agricultural yields of which the remainder of Greece amply benefitted. Today the region isn't particularly renowned for it's agronomy as it was erstwhile. Through modern farming methods and equipment, the fertile Italian lands could be utilized to feed Greek mouths anew whilst attracting new settlers to toil the fields.

In the name of the King of the Hellenes, the lands of Asia Minor shall be restored under Greek rule! With this motion we shall also extend our claims north into the Balkans, where substantial Greek minorities inhabit. Time has come to avenge Manzikert and expel those who banished us from our homeland centuries ago! For Freedom or Death!
The weak Haida Confederacy up north finds itself in a vulnerable spot waiting for any European power to strike at its foundations. They would surely be better off under our protection.

The northern Zakatlani Borderland was one of particular interest for our people over the past decades. Claiming the area would provide access to yet untapped mineral deposits whilst accommodating the land needs of arriving immigrants.

Westerhof effectively served as the Ingemaric League's capital ever since the first Europeans arrived and settled here in North Colombia. Today this effectiveness finds itself diminished as the League expands further away from the eastern most point of the continent. The thriving city of Ottoborg with it's strategic and central location would serve the excellent capital whilst bolstering the path to unification.

Let us not repeat the mistakes of our European forefathers. For the League's continuity it is vital to bring all the Divisions together under the government in Ottoborg. The Ingemard Constitution is to be drafted, letting the Divisions retain a certain degree of local autonomy in a joint Confederation headed by Ottoborg. Only then will no one tear us apart!

The areas around the Great Lakes have been disputed for ages between the Ingemards and Veldleuwer, consequently leading to further disputes over colonial lands beyond. One war is all we need to solve our disputes once and for all! Fur die Liga!

The areas around the Great Lakes have been disputed for ages between the Veldleuwer and Ingemards, consequently leading to further disputes over colonial lands beyond. One war is all we need to solve our disputes once and for all! Voor de Republiek!

Long gone are the times of discrimination based on race in our nation. It is time to give full rights to the Indianer (German and native half-breed) minority. Only then will the League reach it's full potential standing as the shining beacon of Colombia.

Having defeated the Dutch enemy across the Great Lakes, it's in order for Ingemarland to settle the border dispute with Acadia. Envisioned by our greatest of intellectuals, a border reaching the Appalachian Mountain range boundary alongside the inclusion of German merchant towns on the coast would provide the perfect solution to our struggle.
We have allowed the Danubian Banate in the south to garner too much autonomy. It is time to finally integrate them into Hungary proper!

Long enough have the Hungarian Danubian Banates been seperated. In order to achieve better governance we will put forth a proposition to the Hungarian King to unite the Banates of Sewernburg and Matschau. It won't be hard convincing the King as this would be beneficial to both sides.
Germany of the Balkans has finally been freed of it's chains. No longer do our former overlords have a valid claim on our nation!
Centuries ago the Gepid Kingdom of old held control over some additional borderland to our current south. Now that we are independent we should aim to restore our southern frontier.

The eastern part of Slavonia is inhabited by a substantial German minority for centuries but was never formally part of any Danubian Banate. We must incorporate our brethren into one united and strong Danubian nation!

Transylvania, known as Siebenburgen to the Germans after the seven German cities located inside of it, is a region in the western Pannonian Basin in which many Germans settled since the 12th century. The Hungarian crown invited these Germans in order to colonize the land, develop agriculture and promote urbanisation but the lands never got organized as a proper German Banate. Thus it is our duty to protect the Germans of Siebenburgen just like the Teutons did back when they first settled the land.

The old Gepid Kingdom used to own all the land east of the Danube in the Pannonian Basin. Though no Germanic peoples settled in the region after the Gepid Kingdom's fall, we are now powerful enough to claim the entirety of the region for ourselves and make a land bridge to the rest of Germany.
Aquitania has proven itself to be a seafaring merchant nation in the past. Venturing southwards to secure additional coastline would only bring forth great benefits to our maritime trade.
A question lays unanswered. The Question regarding the future of our western frontier. Soon it's fate shall be decided, but how exactly?

Nothing stands on our way as our enemies stand defeated in the west. Now with proper preparation in place we are able to launch a swift incursion into the northern Guarani lands and seize them for further settlement.

The great plain on our southern border, the Wheat Valley is a large and sparsely populated region of South Colombia. As our population grows so does the need for settling lands, therefore it is time to establish rule over the Valley of Wheat.
We are now deemed strong enough by the eyes of the World in order to validly stake a claim to the South Colombian Cone. Soon the region shall be ours!

$COUNTRY$ is left with one yet unresolved territorial issue. The Malvinas Islands positioned east of our southern coastline are a strategically important area of the Atlantic Ocean and a natural part of our nation. Whoever owns them shall rule the seas of the south but now our turn has come. With improvements in naval technology and expansion of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Navy we shall take what is rightfully ours!
The $COUNTRY$ has resolved its border dispute with Mordredland by blood and now finds itself able to consolidate the previously disputed and unsettled inlands area in the north.

The Kingdom has consolidated the northern hinterland but there still remains some colonial land of interest to our people. Settling the plain area across the Parana river would allow for much greater control of the important river and with enough settlers it can be done.

The 1817 convention in Carpentier saw the dissolution of Antarctique over the matters of religion and slavery. Decades have passed and our people still feel the annals of the past. Time has come to mend the wounds and realize the dream that was lost all those years ago. Pour Sainte! Vive l'Antarctique!

The 1817 convention in Carpentier saw the dissolution of Antarctique over the matters of religion and slavery. Decades have passed and our people still feel the annals of the past. Time has come to mend the wounds and realize the dream that was lost all those years ago. Pour Sainte! Vive l'Antarctique!

For the sake of better administration and national unity we need to change our capital. Sitting on the Atlantic coast just across the bay from Aquitania, Castel Colina, including its central location and historical symbolism would make for an ideal capital. Alongside that, a change of name to Saintespont in honor of our greatest revolutionary Josep Sainte would be in order.
The African community in our nation has greatly suffered throughout the centuries. With slavery abolished and the country heading into the future we ought to provide rights to the former slaves.
In order to prepare the Great Andean Crusade we must first pacify the bordering Amazon tribes in order to secure the invasion route.
It's our role to protect the Catholic minority in the Incan Empire from the Incans' Satanic mix of cults and beliefs.Deus Vult!

The infidel Empire of the Incas was toppled by our bold crusaders. With it dies the last hope of any non-Christian polities of South Colombia. Now we must face a new enemy far greater than the Incas, across the big pond. Let us finish what our ancestors started and restore the Holy Land to it's rightful rulers!
The Amazon Rainforest is filled with valuable tropical resources waiting to be claimed. Our only obstacle in taking over the region are the indigenous people that roam the rainforest.

One good thing the Jesuits have brought with them to the New World was their extensive knowledge of medical practices. With new technological advancements made in the field of medicine we can combine them with previous vast knowledge in order to give our healthcare a major upgrade.

The corrupt ex-Jesuit government looked only for ways to exploit the native population using the pretense of spreading the Lord's message, so naturally educating the natives wasn't in their interest as it was unprofitable. Thus the native population is left highly uneducated and secluded from our society, therefore we shall reach out to them by expanding the extent of our education system. It won't be easy, but for the sake of unity and mending the wounds left over by the Jesuits it shall be done!

Our nation covers vast ground and can not be simply administered from the far northern Caracas which also serves as a constant reminder of ex-Jesuit rule. If the Andine Confederation was to stand as a truly united nation something must be done. Firstly, turning Quito, a city sitting on the crossroads of all our diverse peoples into the new beating heart of our nation would be ideal for partially solving our issue but that's not all. Secondly, governorates are to be established in the southern regions led by locally elected native governors. The Governorates would be granted high autonomy to better reflect on it's people's needs and to eliminate the need of depending on Quito for everything. With these reforms our Confederation shall become truly united!

Much like us, the Huguenot people of the south descended from the Occitan Calvinist settlers speak one of the several Latin languages. What makes them more similar to us rather than their bordering French counterparts is their language being much more similar to ours rather than French but due to assimilation efforts their language in Europe is dying out. Therefore we shall do them well and integrate our Aquitanian brethren into the Confederation.
We have garnered enough control over the Ngabe tribes and are now able to undisputedly integrate them into our nation.
The vast territories of the Andes are rightfully ours and shall therefore be using Spanish toponyms
